original_text: and saw two angels in white, seated where Jesus’ body had been, one at the head and the other at the foot.
korean_text: 흰 옷 입은 두 천사가 예수의 시체 뉘었던 곳에 하나는 머리 편에, 하나는 발 편에 앉았더라

sentences.original_text: and saw two angels in white
sentences.korean_translation: 흰 옷을 입은 두 천사를 보았다

sentences.original_text: seated where Jesus' body had been
sentences.korean_translation: 예수의 몸이 있던 자리에 앉아 있었다

sentences.original_text: and the other at the foot
